page.title: 02ARTS & CRAFTS
page.content: The{Martlets Hall}and{Park Centre } are venues for local art and drama societies. { Burgess Hill Theatre Club,Burgess {Hill Operatic Society}and the Sinfonietta put on many interesting events throughout the year. Hurstpierpoint has quite an interesting and locally famous theatre called the{Malthouse.}It is housed in an old converted barn. Its membership is wide and includes many children. { The Weald of Sussex Artists}have an annual exhibition in the Martlets Hall. Their paintings and sculptures are on sale to the public. { The Salvation Army}have a superb brass band.There is a band at{Scouts and two championship class bands,{The {Boys and Girls Brigade Band}and the{ {Mid-Sussex Marching Band.}There are also Bugle and Bagpipe Corps.
